description:
I am running the attached boto based  script and I  unable to read the error_code, it shows None.

Per the S3 API documentation it must provide this value.
title: nova-objectstore on not existing bucket GET does not provide ErrorCode

comments.content:
I am running the attached boto based  script and I  unable to read the error_code, it shows None.

Per the S3 API documentation it must provide this value.

comments.content: Just checked this against https://github.com/openstack/nova/tree/3ffa40cc9a6c4fd2a04a9bc72cee22e1772176b0, and the HEAD test passes, the DELETE test gets the right return code.. but fails on the error message.
